message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $87 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
